ARABIC: قُلْ يَتَوَفَّىٰكُم مَّلَكُ ٱلْمَوْتِ ٱلَّذِى وُكِّلَ بِكُمْ ثُمَّ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكُمْ تُرْجَعُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Say: 'The Angel of Death, who has been given charge of you, will take you back and then you will be sent back to your Lord.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Say: "The angel of death appointed over you will take away your soul, then you will be sent back to your Lord."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Tell them: “The angel of death who has been charged with your souls shall gather you, and then you shall be brought back to your Lord.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: (Muhammad), say, "The angel of death, who is appointed over everyone of you, will cause you to die and to your Lord you will all return."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Proclaim, “The angel of death, who is appointed over you, causes you to die and then towards your Lord you will return.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Say: "The angel of death, who is set over you, will take your souls. Then you shall be brought to your Lord."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Say: The angel of death who is given charge of you shall cause you to die, then to your Lord you shall be brought back.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Say: 'Death's angel, who has been charged with you, shall gather you, then to your Lord you shall be returned.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Say: The angel of death, who hath charge concerning you, will gather you, and afterward unto your Lord ye will be returned.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Say, "The Angel of Death who has been given charge of you will gather in your souls. Then you will [all] be returned to your Lord."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Say thou: the angel of death who is set over you shall cause you to die, thereafter unto your Lord ye shall be returned.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Say, ‘You will be taken away by the angel of death, who has been charged with you. Then you will be brought back to your Lord.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Say: "The Angel of Death, put in charge of you, will (duly) take your souls: then shall ye be brought back to your Lord."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Say: "The angel of death, who is set over you, will take your souls, then you shall be brought to your Lord."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Say: 'The Angel of Death, who has been given charge of you will gather you then to your Lord you shall be returned'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Say, “The angel of death put in charge of you will reclaim you. Then to your Lord you will be returned.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Say, "The angel of death will take you who has been entrusted with you. Then to your Lord you will be returned."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [32:11]   Say, to them: ‘The Angel of death, who has been charged with you, shall receive you [in death], in other words, he shall seize your spirits, then to your Lord you shall be returned’, alive, whereat He will requite you for your deeds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Say) to them, Muhammad: (The angel of death, who hath charge concerning you, will gather you) will take away your souls, (and afterward unto your Lord ye will be returned) in the Hereafter.
